text: Gurkha regiment may refer to: * Brigade of Gurkhas, Nepalese soldiers who serve within the British Army * Gorkha regiments (India), various infantry regiments in the Indian Army, recruited primarily from Nepal * 1st Gorkha Rifles (The Malaun Regiment) * 2nd King Edward VII's Own Gurkha Rifles (The Sirmoor Rifles) * 3rd Gorkha Rifles * 4th Gorkha Rifles * Royal Gurkha Rifles * Gurkha Category:Gurkhas
title: Gurkha regiment
